name: Haint
languages: any languages it knew in life

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The haint can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The haint doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The haint makes two Sorrowful Touch attacks.

action.name: Sorrowful Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) psychic damage.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The haint magically assumes the appearance of the Humanoid it was in life, while retaining its game statistics. The assumed appearance ends if the haint is reduced to 0 hit points or uses an action to end it.
